stories.title: What is new in Perl v5.36?
Tribal request to halt Arizona copper mine work is denied
Show HN: 1paragraph, ePub reader that opens books at the paragraph you last read

stories.text:
Not sure how this will fare but we'll see. I use the same parts of my brain writing code as I do writing music so there should be some overlap.

Do you know of any site or community where you can post your music and receive constructive and informed criticism from knowledgeable musicians? I'm trying this thing out but I don't have a local support network.

Here's and example on mine to get a feeling: https://drive.google.com/file/d/19AhC-Qr68i2J4l3GCrtE0O8v47ANMwPR/view?usp=drivesdk
stories.title: Ask HN: Place to post music and revive constructive feedback?
